snippet: Federal officials say an airliner nearly collided in March with an airborne drone over Tallahassee, Fla.
abstract: Federal officials say airliner nearly collided in March with airborne drone over Tallahassee, Fla; near collision was reported to air traffic control on March 22 by pilot of an American Airlines Group jet as plane approached the Tallahassee runway.
lead_paragraph: Federal officials say an airliner nearly collided in March with an airborne drone over Tallahassee, Fla.

headline.main: California: Airplane Nearly Hit Drone Over Florida in March
headline.print_headline: California: Airplane Nearly Hit Drone Over Florida in March
